column4: Every so often bits of either the bottom or top panels have a chuck go missing from them http://i.imgur.com/22SBc.png Anyone seen this before?
One thing I don't like about 11.04 is unity. The file menu is on your top panel and your scroll bar disappears. I much prefer metacity.
Every so often bits from either the bottom or top panels have a chuck go missing from them. http://i.imgur.com/22SBc.png Anyone seen this before?
